meta.title: World 7: OOP & Beyond - Quiz
meta.intro: Test your understanding of OOP concepts like classes, inheritance, encapsulation, and polymorphism.

classes.question: Which keyword defines a class in Python?

inheritance.question: Which class is the parent in 'class Dog(Animal):'?

encapsulation.question: Private variables in Python often start with ___
Encapsulation means exposing all internal details of a class.

polymorphism.question: Polymorphism allows different classes to use the same ___ name.
Polymorphism means one function behaves the same everywhere.
